H0.text: Which commission was set up to investigate the assassination of JFK. Church Committee

H1.text: Which commission was set up to investigate the assassination of JFK. Rockefeller Commission

H2.text: Which commission was set up to investigate the assassination of JFK. House Select Committee on Assassinations

H3.text: Which commission was set up to investigate the assassination of JFK. Warren Report

A5.text: The Church Commission conducted an investigation into the assassination of John F. Kennedy and found that federal agencies failed in their duties.

A6.text: The Select Committee on Assassinations was established by the U.S. House of Representatives in 1979.
